This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 558 Sq.
Ft.
CRAFTED TO PERFECTION
Welcome to 808 West Apartments, a truly unique community in heart of San Jose's Midtown district.
In this vibrant, pedestrian-friendly neighborhood, you are just minutes away from numerous cafes and bars, trendy shopping, beautiful parks and convenient transportation.
Our open, airy living spaces are finished with sleek quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, ample walk-in closets, wood-style plank flooring in living areas and an in-home washer and dryer.

Outside your door, the lifestyle-focused amenities such as resort style pool and spa, outdoor lounge, pet park and pet grooming station deliver unbeatable convenience for those who love to live stress-free and on the go.
Features:
Stainless steel appliances, Island with pendant lighting*, Vinyl wood-style plank flooring*, Tile backsplash, Oversized walk-in closets, Quartz countertops in kitchen & bath, Washer & dryer provided
Community Amenities:

Fitness center with yoga room, Pet park & dog wash, Bicycle workshop, Cyber café & conference room, First floor retail, Direct access multi-level parking garage, Clubhouse with billiards, Outdoor fireplace lounge, Resort-style pool and spa with open air cabanas
Pet Policy
